subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ben Curtis, who went 1-1-1 in his Ryder Cup debut last month, has selected Brandt Snedeker to be his partner for the World Cup, which will be played in China from Nov. 22 to 25.
snippet: Ben Curtis, who went 1-1-1 in his Ryder Cup debut last month, has selected Brandt Snedeker to be his partner for the World Cup, which will be played in China from Nov. 22 to 25.
